head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WAUCHOPE, HELEN J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WAUCHOPE, HELEN J.

block.p: WAUCHOPE-Helen J., of Lloyd Harbor, on May 9, 2000, at the age of 99. Beloved wife of the late VAdm. George M. Wauchope. Loving mother of Keith, Anne Smith, and the late Douglas J. Cherished grandmother of Suzanne Smith Kenny, Mark Morley Smith, Valerie Smith Brancato, Gavin Underhill Smith, Ian A.D. Wauchope, and Colin P.K. Wauchope. Dear great-grandmother of N. Liam Patrick Kenny and Brooke Wade Kenny. Caring mother-in-law of Morley L. Smith. Religious Service 9 a.m. Monday May 22, 2000 at Arlington National Cemetery, Old Post Chapel, Arlington, VA. For information contact A.L. Jacobsen Funeral Home, Inc. Huntington Station, NY.
